channel.title: Home on Ambi4: Ambience for Work
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Ambi4: Ambience for Work

item.title: xander.
item.description: Does anyone know who ‘xander.’ is? We loved a couple of his tracks that we found in Apple’s BEATstrumentals playlist, so we added his albums here (minus any tracks we consider less conducive to work…)

item.title: Eno
item.description: The three genre-defining albums & more from Brian Eno.

item.title: Mozart
item.description: Given the ‘Mozart Effect’, we thought we would kick off with a carefully curated set of concertos and other works that help us get into a flow state.
